content: in this complete beginner tutorial we ll be crocheting pumpkins without sewing anything together this amigurumi crochet pattern is designed for absolute beginners and includes a video tutorial and an interactive pdf pattern includes digital printer friendly pdf interactive pattern built for multiple devices video crochet along english and spanish language pdf the materials needed the yarn worsted weight wool size g6/4 00mm hook stuffing small amount needle other info skill level - beginner gauge 5 rnds and 4 sts per 1 finished piece is about 12 long worked in the round without turning
